title: Java.lang.NullPointerException in "AWT-EventQueue-0"

milestone.description: Enhancements and bug fixes expected to be included in the next main release.

body:
Hi, 

booting zaproxy results in a `NullPointerException`. I didn't found any previous issues covering this, so I am opening a new one. Sorry if it's duplicates nevertheless.

``` Bash
Found Java version 1.8.0_66
Available memory:  7781 MB
Setting jvm heap size: -Xmx2048m
```

**[update]**: 

``` bash
 % uname -a
Linux blackspartacus 4.2.7.201512092320-1-grsec #1 SMP PREEMPT Thu Dec 10 12:36:31 EST 2015 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
